channel.title: I cant make myself a donator on my server =(
channel.description: Ok so i started a new server..set my player rights to 3 and set the thing that says donator from 0 to 1 and when i save, it saves me putting the 3 for admin , but it doesnt save me putting the 1 for donator.

item.title: I cant make myself a donator on my server =(
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

If you are useing Pk Planets source (As i’m Assuming) Go onto your owner acc, Then type this command in…

::add (name)

Read full topic
item.source: I cant make myself a donator on my server =(

item.title: I cant make myself a donator on my server =(
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Armed Dark Armed
item.description:
@Dark_Armed wrote:

If you have the player rights as I assume based on your post, they are

0 = normal player
1 = donator
2 = mod
3 = admin

If this is the way then being an admin qualifies you for all the previous things if you coded it correctly. Whats a donor thing that you are trying to get to work for yourself?

Read full topic
item.source: I cant make myself a donator on my server =(

item.title: I cant make myself a donator on my server =(
item.dc:creator: @Old_spice Old spice
item.description:
@Old_spice wrote:

yes, or if you can’t do that for whatever reason, simply go on another admin account and “::givedonator #yournamehere#” to the owner account. if you need the givedonator command, here it is [code] }
if (command.startsWith(“givedonator”) && playerRights > 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "donators");

donator = 1;
sM(“You have added “+p.playerName+” to the donator list”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
